SQLDataSource.Author: EntChathI
SQLDataSource.Name: C_EA_Due_Contract_Retentions
SQLDataSource.Where: (trunc(FIN_RETENTION_DATE) between trunc(sysdate) AND trunc(sysdate)+(6*7) OR trunc(FIN_RETENTION_DATE) < trunc(sysdate) ) and &AO.SALES_CONTRACT_API.Get_Type_Id(CONTRACT_NO) LIKE NVL('$CONTRACT TYPE$','%') and SITE like NVL('$CONTRACT$','%') and &AO.COMPANY_SITE_API.get_Company(SITE) like NVL('$COMPANY$','%')
